Text: The bank was larger than others in customer deposits with N4.18trillion and also in total assets, which increased to N6.49trillion after its merger with Diamond Bank.
Effect: The bank was larger than others in customer deposits with N4.18trillion and also in total assets, which increased to N6.49trillion
Sentence: <e2>The bank was larger than others in customer deposits with N4.18trillion and also in total assets, which increased to N6.49trillion</e2> after <e1>its merger with Diamond Bank.</e1>
